## Viewport.rotateElement() method

Rotates the element with the given id, recalculating bounds afterwards.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rotateElement(id: string, rotation: number): ViewportElement<T["E"]>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string |  |
|  rotation | number |  |
